post.description:
Get Google OAuth2 authorization URL

This endpoint generates a Google OAuth2 authorization URL that clients can use
to redirect users to Google for authentication.

Get Microsoft OAuth2 authorization URL

This endpoint generates a Microsoft OAuth2 authorization URL that clients can use
to redirect users to Microsoft for authentication.

Google OAuth2 callback endpoint

This endpoint handles the OAuth2 callback from Google and exchanges the
authorization code for a JWT token.

Microsoft OAuth2 callback endpoint

This endpoint handles the OAuth2 callback from Microsoft and exchanges the
authorization code for a JWT token.

get.description:
OAuth2 error endpoint

This endpoint handles OAuth2 authentication errors and provides
error information to clients.

post.description:
Initiate password reset process

This endpoint allows users to request a password reset by providing their email.
A reset token will be sent to their email if the account exists.

Validate password reset token

This endpoint validates whether a password reset token is valid and not expired.

Reset user password using reset token

This endpoint allows users to reset their password using a valid reset token.

Change user password (requires authentication)

This endpoint allows authenticated users to change their password by providing
their current password and the new password.
